text: Ezɨ me ghuava dadarimɨn ghuegha Iesus gumazamizir avɨribar garima, me guizbangɨra bar avɨraseme. A men garima, me sipsipbar mɨn ami, me ghuaviba puvatɨ, me pura asaghasazibar mɨn arui. A kamaghɨn bar men apangkufi. Egha a bizir avɨriba men sure gami.(6:34) Nɨ sipsipɨn mɨngarim gɨfoghsɨ, akɨrangɨn itir Akar Mɨngaribar gan.
